title: Another kind of music
creator_credit: Glen Salzman, Rebecca Yates and Fruits and Roots
brief_description: The story of four people from very different backgrounds, who are drawn together by their love of music. This simple story-line based around reggae music is designed to stimulate ideas on multiculturalism by emphaszing positive contributions of different cultures.
